text: قَـٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

translation.en.sahih: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
translation.id.indonesian: (Muhammad) berkata: "Ya Tuhanku, berilah keputusan dengan adil. Dan Tuhan kami ialah Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah lagi Yang dimohonkan pertolongan-Nya terhadap apa yang kamu katakan".
